subject: Re: Flock for Businesses
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hey Detective DeWitt,

Here is a screenshot of our placements here. My audio detection specialist is OOO today but let me know if you have any questions and I can pass those along. 


 


Best,
 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/21341489-85a2-45cd-a647-713acf49f059.gif> 

On Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 11:04?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	What�s the radius for the Raven where those gun shots would be detected just based on those two units?

	Derek

	Detective D. DeWitt
	Financial Crimes Unit
	Special Weapons and Tactics Team
	Eugene Police Department
	300 County Club Road
	Eugene, OR 97401
	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
	Work Celll � 541-743-6192
________________________________

	From: Randy Zobel <randy.zobel@flocksafety.com randy.zobel@flocksafety.com >
	Sent: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 1:22:03 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: FW: Flock for Businesses 
	 
	You don't often get email from randy.zobel@flocksafety.com randy.zobel@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hey Derek,  

	I will reach out to him now. Thank you for sending over his contact information. 

	Thank you, 
	 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/219730f8-b03a-4419-bc85-54dac1d0f6a3.gif> 

	On Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 2:08?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Randy,

		 

		I met today with representatives from Oregon Community Credit Union.  Their Law Enforcement Investigator liaison is Mike Rustik who is a retired Detective with our department.  They have an interest in Flock.  I CC�d Mike on this email and he can help set up some introductions if you want to respond directly to him and provide your information and contact information.

		 

		Derek

		 

		Detective D. DeWitt

		Financial Crimes Unit

		Special Weapons and Tactics Team

		Background Investigations Team

		Eugene Police Department

		300 County Club Road

		Eugene, OR 97401

		Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

		Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

		Work Cell � 541-743-6192

		 

		



	-- 
	
	
Randy Zobel

-- 

	
Randy Zobel
